sentences.en: Be responsible for rendering secretarial and clerical services to the Financial Controller.
sentences.cn: 做翻译抄写等文书工作.

sentences.en: Do you have any special training in secretarial skills?
sentences.cn: 你接受过任何关于秘书技能的特殊培训 吗 ?

sentences.en: Good secretarial skills should enhance your chances of getting a job.
sentences.cn: 出色的秘书工作技能会增加你找工作的机会.

sentences.en: I have received the secretarial training for six months.
sentences.cn: 我曾接受过6个月的秘书训练.

sentences.en: I took a series of badly paid secretarial jobs which made me really miserable.
sentences.cn: 我做了几份薪酬微薄的秘书工作，这让我非常郁闷。

sentences.en: I was doing temporary secretarial work.
sentences.cn: 我在做临时的秘书工作。

sentences.en: Manager's schedule, customer information collection, production orders and other secretarial work.
sentences.cn: 经理的日程安排, 客户信息收集, 定单制作等各项秘书工作.

sentences.en: My secretarial duties includes taking shorthand, typing and filing.
sentences.cn: 我作为秘书的职务包括:速记 、 打字和整理档案.

sentences.en: Organize and guide the secretarial and archival work of Mazda Division.
sentences.cn: 组织和引导马自达事业部的秘书及文档工作.

sentences.en: Secretarial work seems to be the only thing available for you.
sentences.cn: 秘书工作似乎是唯一可给你做的工作了.

sentences.en: She decided to do a secretarial course.
sentences.cn: 她决定修一门文秘课程。

sentences.en: Some secretarial experience and a cooperative personality are musts.
sentences.cn: 须略具秘书经验、个性合作.

sentences.en: The duties of the post are mainly secretarial.
sentences.cn: 这个岗位的职责主要是文秘工作.

sentences.en: What courses have you taken in English Secretarial Studies?
sentences.cn: 你在英文秘书方面修了哪些课程?

sentences.en: What major courses have you taken in English Secretarial Studies?
sentences.cn: 你都学了有关英文秘书学的哪些主要课程.

words.tran_cn: 秘书处；书记处；秘书（书记，部长等）之职
书记、秘书等的职务或任期

trans.tran_cn: 秘书的，书记的，部长的，大臣的
trans.tran_en: relating to the work of a secretary
